name: The Feast (itch)
description:
Made in 10 hours for ld43 on the theme "Sacrifice must be made".

You play as a hellish abomination trying to feast on knights and mages in the name of hell. For every blast you sacrifice bit of health. 

The catch is, one blast costs more than one dead body can replenish. So try to play strategically!

Tiles, hero and enemies: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
Author — 0x72

Projectile: https://dannypixel.itch.io/assetspack01-dannypixel
Author — DannyPixel

Shield and health potion: https://uilleaggodwin.itch.io/roguelike-dungeon-asset-bundle
Author — UilleagGodwin

OST https://soundcloud.com/dubmood/dubmood-chiptune
